Cell.Data: DIPLOMATICSTATES_DEFINITIONS

The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.
SCENE ID
TEXT ID
ENGLISH STRING
LOCALIZED STRING
ALTERNATIVE ENGLISH STRING
ALTERNATIVE LOCALIZED STRING
LOCALIZATION NOTES
DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES
OPTION_WAR_NORMAL_CB
NAME
Declare War with Normal Casus Belli (6-10[CasusBelli/])
以普通宣战理由 (6-10[CasusBelli/]) 宣战
This is listed as an item in the interface
OPTION_WAR_NORMAL_CB
DESCRIPTION
Declare war on the other player using a normal Casus Belli. Your diplomatic state will change to war and your Popular Support will increase.
使用普通宣战理由向另一名玩家宣战，你们的外交状态将变更为交战，并且你的民众支持将会提升。
This is a tooltip for a trade item in the trade interface
Declare war on the other player using a normal Casus Belli, your diplomatic state will change to war and your Popular Support will increase.
OPTION_WAR_MINOR_CB
NAME
Declare War with Minor Casus Belli (1-5[CasusBelli/])
以轻微宣战理由 (1-5[CasusBelli/]) 宣战
This is listed as an item in the interface
OPTION_WAR_MINOR_CB
DESCRIPTION
Declare war on the other player using a minor Casus Belli. Your diplomatic state will change to war and your Popular Support will increase.
使用轻微宣战理由向另一名玩家宣战，你们的外交状态将变更为交战，并且你的民众支持将会提升。
This is a tooltip for a trade item in the trade interface
Declare war on the other player using a minor Casus Belli, your diplomatic state will change to war and your Popular Support will increase.
OPTION_WAR_MAJOR_CB
NAME
Declare War with Major Casus Belli (11+[CasusBelli/])
以重大宣战理由 (11+[CasusBelli/]) 宣战
This is listed as an item in the interface
OPTION_WAR_MAJOR_CB
DESCRIPTION
Declare war on the other player using a major Casus Belli. Your diplomatic state will change to war and your Popular Support will increase.
使用重大宣战理由向另一名玩家宣战，你们的外交状态将变更为战争，且你的民众支持将会提升。
This is a tooltip for a trade item in the trade interface
Declare war on the other player using a major Casus Belli, your diplomatic state will change to war and your Popular Support will increase.
OPTION_WAR
NAME
Declare War without Casus Belli
在没有宣战理由的情况下宣战
This is listed as an item in the interface
OPTION_WAR
DESCRIPTION
Declare war on the other player. This will change your relationship state to war and you will suffer a Population Support penalty.
向另一名玩家宣战。，这将导致你们的关系状态变更为交战，并且你将会受到民众支持惩罚。
This is a tooltip for a trade item in the trade interface
Declare war on the other player, this will change your relationship state to war and you will suffer a Population Support penalty.
OPTION_PEACE
NAME
Offer a Non-Aggression Pact
提出互不侵犯协议
This is listed as an item in the interface
OPTION_PEACE
DESCRIPTION
Offer a non-aggression pact in which both player retain a peaceful state.
提出互不侵犯协议，双方玩家维持和平状态。
This is a tooltip for a trade item in the trade interface
OPTION_NEUTRAL
NAME
Offer Truce
提出休战
This is listed as an item in the interface
OPTION_NEUTRAL
DESCRIPTION
Offer a truce in which both players agree to cease all hostile action.
提出休战，双方玩家同意停止一切敌对行为。
This is a tooltip for a trade item in the trade interface
Offer a truce in which both players agree to stop their war.
OPTION_VASSALAGE
NAME
You become vassal
你成为了封臣
This is listed as an item in the interface
OPTION_VASSALAGE
DESCRIPTION

Become vassal of the other player. This effectively creates a fixed alliance with the other player which only the overlord can break. The deal only works if neither player is already a vassal. The overlord will gain an additional {INT_energy}% energy and {INT_research}% research per turn based on the income of their vassal.
成为另一名玩家的封臣，这将立即与另一名玩家建立固定的同盟关系，只有领主才能打破该关系。只有在双方均不是封臣时，这项协议才会生效。领主在每回合将根据封臣的收益额外获得 {INT_energy}% 能量和 {INT_research}% 研究。
This is a tooltip for a trade item in the trade interface
Offer to become a vassal of the other player, this effectively creates a fixed alliance with the other player, which cannot be broken. The deal only works if the other player is not already a vassal.
OPTION_DEFENSIVE
NAME
Offer a Defensive Pact
提出防御协议
This is listed as an item in the interface
OPTION_DEFENSIVE
DESCRIPTION
Offer a defensive pact in which both players try to aid each other in war.
提出防御协议，双方玩家在战争中互相提供援助。
This is a tooltip for a trade item in the trade interface
OPTION_ALLIANCE
NAME
Propose Alliance
提议同盟
This is listed as an item in the interface
OPTION_ALLIANCE
DESCRIPTION
Propose an alliance with the other player. This is a mutual action, and both players need to share a defensive pact first.
提议与另一名玩家建立同盟。这是一种相互作用，双方玩家需要先共享防御协议。
This is a tooltip for a trade item in the trade interface
Propose an alliance with the other player. This is a mutual action, both players need to share a defensive pact first.
BREAK_NONAGGRESSION
NAME
Break Non-Aggression Pact
破坏互不侵犯协议
This is listed as an item in the interface
BREAK_NONAGGRESSION
DESCRIPTION
Break your non-aggression pact and revert back to a neutral state. This will incur some opinion and reputation penalties.
破坏你的互不侵犯协议并退回至中立状态。这将造成一定的评价和声望惩罚。
This is a tooltip for a trade item in the trade interface
Break your non-aggression pact and revery back to a neutral state, this will incur some opinion and reputation penalties.
BREAK_DEFENSIVE
NAME
Break Defensive Pact
破坏防御协议
This is listed as an item in the interface
BREAK_DEFENSIVE
DESCRIPTION
Break your defensive pact and revert back to a neutral state. This will incur moderate opinion and reputation penalties.
破坏你的防御协议并退回至中立状态。这将造成中等的评价和声望惩罚。
This is a tooltip for a trade item in the trade interface
Break your defensive pact and revert back to a neutral state, this will incur moderate opinion and reputation penalties.
BREAK_ALLIANCE
NAME
Break Alliance
结束同盟
This is listed as an item in the interface
BREAK_ALLIANCE
DESCRIPTION
Break your alliance and revert back to a neutral state. This will incur heavy opinion and reputation penalties.
结束你的同盟状态并退回至中立状态。这将造成严重的评价和声望惩罚。
This is a tooltip for a trade item in the trade interface
Break your alliance and revert back to a neutral state, this incurs heavy opinion and reputation penalties.
OPENBORDERS
NAME
Open borders
开放边境
This is listed as an item in the interface
OPENBORDERS
DESCRIPTION
Open borders to the other player.
向另一名玩家开放边境。
This is a tooltip for a trade item in the trade interface
OPENBORDERSFORTURNS
NAME
Open borders for fixed duration
在固定时间内开放边境
This is listed as an item in the interface
OPENBORDERSFORTURNS
DESCRIPTION
Open borders to the other player for a fixed duration.
在固定时间内向另一名玩家开放边境。
This is a tooltip for a trade item in the trade interface
SHAREVISION
NAME
Share vision
共享视野
This is listed as an item in the interface
SHAREVISION
DESCRIPTION
Share vision with the other player.
与另一名玩家共享视野。
This is a tooltip for a trade item in the trade interface
SHAREVISIONFORTURNS
NAME
Share vision for fixed duration
在固定时间内共享视野
This is listed as an item in the interface
SHAREVISIONFORTURNS
DESCRIPTION
Share vision with the other player for a fixed duration.
在固定时间内与另一名玩家共享视野。
This is a tooltip for a trade item in the trade interface
SHAREINTELLIGENCE
NAME
Share intelligence
共享情报
This is listed as an item in the interface
SHAREINTELLIGENCE
DESCRIPTION
Share an intelligence pact with the other player.
与另一名玩家共享情报协议。
This is a tooltip for a trade item in the trade interface
SHAREINTELLIGENCEFORTURNS
NAME
Share intelligence for fixed duration
在固定时间内共享情报
This is listed as an item in the interface
SHAREINTELLIGENCEFORTURNS
DESCRIPTION
Share an intelligence pact with the other player for a fixed duration.
在固定时间内与另一名玩家共享情报协议。
This is a tooltip for a trade item in the trade interface
ALLOWCLAIMEDSECTORS
NAME
Allow building on claimed sectors
允许在已拥有主权的区域进行建造
This is listed as an item in the interface
ALLOWCLAIMEDSECTORS
DESCRIPTION
Allow the other player to build on claimed sectors.
允许另一名玩家在拥有主权的区域进行建造。
This is a tooltip for a trade item in the trade interface
Allow the other player to build on sectors that you claimed.
ALLOWCLAIMEDSECTORSFORTURNS
NAME
Allow building on claimed sectors for a fixed duration.
在固定时间内允许在已拥有主权的区域进行建造。
This is listed as an item in the interface
Allow building on claimed sectors for a fixed duration
ALLOWCLAIMEDSECTORSFORTURNS
DESCRIPTION
Allow building on claimed sectors for a fixed duration.
在固定时间内允许在已拥有主权的区域进行建造。
This is a tooltip for a trade item in the trade interface
Allow the other player to build on sectors that you claimed for a fixed duration.
OPTION_ALLIANCE
AI_DESC
I propose we forge an alliance so we may come to each other's aid in the call to war.
我提议我们结成同盟，这样我们就可以在战争中相互援助了。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
I propose we force an alliance so we may come to eachothers aid in the call to war.
OPTION_DEFENSIVE
AI_DESC
It is time we further our peaceful relations and ally ourselves in a defensive pact.
是时候推进我们的和平关系了，让我们缔结防御协议吧。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
OPTION_PEACE
AI_DESC
We should forge a non-aggression pact.
我们应该达成互不侵犯协议。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
OPTION_NEUTRAL
AI_DESC
Let us forget about the past and move into a new future!
让我们忘掉过去，迈向崭新的未来！

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
OPTION_VASSALAGE
AI_DESC
I surrender my empire to you. Let us forge an alliance and work together with me as your vassal.
我的帝国向你投降。让我们结为同盟，我愿意做你的封臣。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
I surrender my empire on to you, let us forge an alliance and work together and I will become your vassal.
OPTION_WAR
AI_DESC
This relationship is over. I'll be coming for you!
我们的关系结束了，我会找上门来的！

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
This relation is over, I'll be coming for you!
OPTION_WAR_MINOR_CB
AI_DESC
You have wronged me too many times. You are next on my list!
你辜负了我太多次。你就是我下一个要对付的人！

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
You have wronged me too many times, you are next on my list!
OPTION_WAR_NORMAL_CB
AI_DESC
You didn't think I would simply forget, did you?
你该不会认为我会就这么忘了吧？

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
You didn't think I would simply forget did you?
OPTION_WAR_MAJOR_CB
AI_DESC
Your actions cannot be be forgiven. I will have my revenge!
你的行为不可饶恕。我一定会复仇的！

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Your actions cannot be be forgiven, I will have my revenge!
BREAK_ALLIANCE
AI_DESC
This alliance no longer seems favorable to me. This is where we part ways.
我们的同盟似乎对我已经没有好处了，就到此为止吧。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
This alliance no longer seems favorable to me, this is where we part ways.
BREAK_DEFENSIVE
AI_DESC
This defensive pact was clearly not a good idea. Remember that I can crush your empire any time I feel like it.
这个防御协议显然并不是什么好主意。记住，只要我愿意，我可以随时把你的帝国夷为平地。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
This defensive pact was clearly not a good idea, remember that I can crush your empire any time I feel like it.
BREAK_NONAGGRESSION
AI_DESC
I need to have more independence. Our pact is over.
我需要更多的独立，我们的协议到此为止。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
I need to have more independence, our pact is over.
OPENBORDERS
AI_DESC
Let us open our borders towards each other. This would greatly improve our mobility.
让我们互相开放边境吧，这将在很大程度上提升我们的机动性。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Let us open our borders towards eachother, this would greatly improve our mobility.
SHAREVISION
AI_DESC
Let us share our vision so we can better assist each other!
让我们共享视野吧，这样一来我们就能更好地互相帮助了！

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
let us share our vision, so we can better assist eachother!
SHAREINTELLIGENCE
AI_DESC
Sharing our intel will provide us with mutual protection!
共享情报能够让我们互相提供保护！

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
ALLOWCLAIMEDSECTORS
AI_DESC
Let's fortify our positions. Allowing me to build near your borders will make us both stronger.
让我们加强阵地防御吧。请允许我在你的边境附近进行建造，这将使我们双方变得更强。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Let's fortify our positions, allowing me to build near your borders will make us stronger.
OPTION_OVERLORD
NAME
You become overlord
你成为了领主
This is listed as an item in the interface
OPTION_OVERLORD
DESCRIPTION

Become overlord over the other player. This effectively creates a fixed alliance with the other player which only the overlord can break. The deal only works if neither player is already a vassal. The overlord will gain an additional {INT_energy}% energy and {INT_research}% research per turn based on the income of their vassal.
成为另一名玩家的领主，这将立即与另一名玩家建立固定的同盟关系，只有领主才能打破该关系。只有在双方均不是封臣时，这项协议才会生效。领主在每回合将根据封臣的收益额外获得 {INT_energy}% 能量和 {INT_research}% 研究。
This is a tooltip for a trade item in the trade interface
TRADE_MODIFIER_DISLIKE
NAME
Overcome Dislikes
克服厌恶
TRADE_MODIFIER
DESCRIPTION
The following modifiers are removed:[br/]{STR_modifiers}[br/]Trading these modifiers will remove them from the relation.
移除以下修改器：[br/]{STR_modifiers}[br/]交易这些修改器将把它们从关系中移除。
OPTION_OVERLORD
AI_DESC
Surrender to me and survive as my loyal vassal. Together, the world will be ours.
臣服于我，成为我忠诚的封臣吧。你我联合，定当扫平天下。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
BREAK_VASSALAGE
NAME
End Vassalage
结束主臣关系
This is listed as an item in the interface
BREAK_VASSALAGE
DESCRIPTION
End the vassalage. This releases the vassal, but maintains the alliance without any penalties.
结束主臣关系。释放封臣，但会继续维持同盟关系且不受任何惩罚。
This is a tooltip for a trade item in the trade interface
BREAK_VASSALAGE
AI_DESC
You have served me well as vassal, but I will now grant you more diplomatic freedom.
作为我的封臣，你将我侍奉得很好。但是现在，我将给予你更高的外交自由。

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

In the text below, text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
